RESPONSE TEXT: They really pulled it off. I'm impressed.
Acadia is just the kind of place a lot synths have dreamed of.
Turns out not everyone here is thrilled with the work the Railroad's doing.
I think that, in time, the Railroad can work with Acadia so everyone can benefit.
